title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; chat, stream, and embed via Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders in chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient TUI wrapper around the Ollama CLI with fuzzy-find model picker and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Local GitHub-Copilot-like VS-Code extension powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin & Android friendly, supports streaming chat.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama with tokio, strongly typed requests/responses.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; chat, stream, pull, and list models from C#.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and docker-compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app to chat with Ollama models on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama completions into your workspace.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama; same feature set as ollama-js repo.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama; same feature set as ollama-python repo.

title: r/ollama - Local LLMs Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tools, and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
